title: Two-Factor Authentication Setup
description: User unable to set up 2FA. QR code not scanning properly on mobile devices.

title: Subscription Billing Error
description: Monthly subscription charge failed. Customer's card was declined multiple times.

title: Server Performance Degradation
description: Application response time increased significantly during peak hours. Database queries taking too long.

title: Android App Login Loop
description: Android users experiencing infinite login loop. App keeps asking for credentials.

title: Bulk Data Import Feature
description: Enterprise customers need ability to import large datasets via CSV upload.

title: Data Breach Investigation
description: Suspicious login attempts detected from multiple IP addresses. Potential security breach.

title: Email Delivery Delays
description: Transactional emails experiencing significant delays. Some emails not delivered at all.

title: Dashboard Loading Issues
description: Main dashboard takes over 30 seconds to load. Charts and graphs not rendering properly.

title: API Integration Timeout
description: Third-party API calls timing out after 30 seconds. Affecting payment processing workflow.

title: Database Backup Failure
description: Automated database backup failed for the past 3 days. Manual backup also failing.

title: GDPR Compliance Request
description: Customer requesting data deletion under GDPR right to be forgotten.

title: Screen Reader Compatibility
description: Website not compatible with screen readers. Accessibility issues for visually impaired users.

title: Customer Support Chat Bot
description: Request for AI-powered chatbot to handle basic customer inquiries automatically.

title: Account Suspension Appeal
description: User account suspended due to suspicious activity. Customer claims account was compromised.

title: Password Policy Update
description: Current password policy too weak. Need to implement stronger requirements and MFA.
